verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
In the springtime of Your word,
Precious promises we heard.
Seeds of hope were sprouting,
watered by Your hand.
Then hot summer lingered on,
Now the harvest come and gone.
Sometimes, we feel a dry and thirsty land.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Chorus:
Send the river.
Send it flowing deep and wide.
Fill our hearts with grace, with faith, With praise, an ever-rising tide.
Overflowing, with Thy Spirit's mighty power.
Send the river rushing through our hearts right now.
